summary: Issue #2056 is a duplicate of #2028. The DEL character (0x7f) sanitization vulnerability was already fixed in commit 77ad8bd. No code changes needed - the fix is already in place.

root_cause.description: N/A - Issue is a duplicate of #2028 which was already fixed

recommendation: Close issue #2056 as a duplicate of #2028. The DEL character sanitization is already implemented and tested.
